item.title: Clojurists Together project - Scicloj - Building Bridges to New Clojure Users - July 2025 update
item.description: Clojurists Together announced a sponsorship for a project by Siyoung Byun – Scicloj - Building Bridges to New Clojure Users for Q2 2025. Here is a summary of the first update for the project - any comments would be greatly appreciated üôè Clojurists Together update - July 2025 - Siyoung Byun # Work Completed, In Progress and Further Plans # CFD Python into Clojure Project # I initiated the CFD Python into Clojure project, which translates computational fluid dynamics (CFD) learning steps from Python into Clojure.
